name: Heliosfera
overview: Heliosfera is a space trade game with some action elements. Norton Axalar, saved from a certain death starts a new life in the Heliosphere star system with one small cargo spaceship. The player's task is to reach the ninth level of the merchant guild through the trade in raw materials on multiple planets. The game allows to take a loan, buy a bigger ship with a proper equipment, bet in the casino and repair the ship. Journey between planets is an arcade element of the game. On a side-scrolling mini game the ship must defeat all incoming enemies and reach the landing point. Failure means the end of the game. The game contains limited random events, such as bandits assault.
